messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] christmas song
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/4/02 4:29:11 PM, abtleo@earthlink.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/4/02 4:29:11 PM, abtleo@... writes:

<< Sing Noel, noel, ye good people gathered here.

<<the tune goes d-a-b-g-a--f--g-g,a,f-e-d.

<<The same tune goes with the Easter hymn "When the green blade riseth" if
that helps anyone.... >>

I don't know either one of them which makes me thing maybe they're recent
compositions.

I'd call a music director at a church where you know they use the one Easter
thing and then ask about the other text.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] christmas song
messages.msgSnippet: I know, I m not ready for Christmas yet, either.  But I m trying to find the words to a carol, and I can t get google to help me on this one.  Does anybody
messages.messageBody:
I know, I'm not ready for Christmas yet, either. But I'm trying to find the
words to a carol, and I can't get google to help me on this one. Does
anybody know the rest of this song? Please send me the words or a website
to track them down if you do. My son wants to sing it in the theatre's
Christmas show but he needs to know all the words for the audition.

Sing Noel, noel, ye good people gathered here.

the tune goes d-a-b-g-a--f--g-g,a,f-e-d.

The same tune goes with the Easter hymn "When the green blade riseth" if
that helps anyone....

thanks!

brenda
